nodes.text: This officer was a human male who served aboard the Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Steadfast during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.

During the climatic battle of Exegol, the officer noticed a group of Resistance fighters targeting the navigation tower that would the Sith fleet to leave Exegol. He reported this to Admiral Frantis Griss and Allegiant General Enric Pryde, who told the officer to switch over the source of the navigation signal to the Steadfast.
